idea:
With the vast and varied experience in the development sector, the founding team realised that technology must play a huge role in helping shape financial management, transparency, and compliance for NGOs.

ERP4Impact is a cloud platform that aims at being a single source of information available for all the stakeholders of an NGO.
Current modules include for management of donors, donations, grants, budgets, limited compliances (IT and FCRA), and expenses.
name: ERP4Impact

idea: RAMESH IYENGAR ASSOCIATES LLP is a Start-up which is set to launch a product that is not available in Mumbai. It is an unique ready to drink, freshly blended South Indian Filter Coffee, also known as Kaapi in the southern states where it is very popular. We believe that there is a opportunity to offer young Indians working in corporate sector, a high quality product, made in a hygenic cloud kitchen and differentiate it from the roadside stalls which are not very hygenic.
name: RAMESH IYENGAR ASSOCIATES LLP

idea: Incorporated in Oct 2021, the firm Vinayaka Akshara Engineering LLP is a bootstrapped initiative. Presently the firm is providing various services,like repair, refit of mechanical equipment/systems, modification, fabrication, upgradation of existing facilities. Undertake maintenance contracts, rate contracts. Provides services related to electrical and civil works. All kind of procurement and supply of materials, items and spare parts. Services as per clients requirements.
name: VINAYAKA AKSHARA ENGINEERING LLP

idea: Integrate X Technologies Private Limited was incorporated on 30th October 2020 under the Companies Act, 2013. The Company is into the business of Software Development and Business Process Management Services & Solution s in BFSI Sector. The Company also provides data analytics, AI, Block Chain, Resource management, independent testing and AI enabled BPM Services & Solutions.
name: INTEGRATE X TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
OG Globe! We are Known for Supply, Inspection and Accuracy in Maintenance field for tomorrows hi tech demanding industry.

We have range of products to meet maintenance personnel demands and products for maintaining trouble free operation in high end industries. We offer wide range of products that meet our Customers requirement in Oil & Gas, Pharma Industries, Food Processing Industries, Fertilizer, Petrochemical, Refinery, Telecom, Power, Cement, Sugar, Paper, Beverages, Steel Plants, Packing Industries, Automobile Industries, Auto Ancillary Units, Components manufacturing units, Aerospace, Nuclear, Research & Development (R&D) departments of Defense Institutes & many more. Our range of products are from worldwide Reputed manufacturers.
name: OG GLOBE

idea: We at PREMNARAYEN TECH VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED are Real Estate which is whether of the property owner, tenant, or buyer, we value of the business and will provide with the individual attention and service which client must deserve. We believe in a strict Code of Ethics. We believe in integrity, commitment to excellence, a professional attitude, and personalized care. Our Fundle is a digital platform that enhances the consumer experience when visiting physical assets as well as development of real estate, financial services and hospitality by collaborating with international domain leaders.
name: PREMNARAYEN TECH VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are a boutique microbrewery making craft beer and have a great vision for the future.

idea:
At Propacy, we make your real estate journey peaceful and seamless

We hate SPAM : Our in-app calling and chat feature ensures your number is never shared with real-estate professionals, so you don't get random calls

We respect your time : Our virtual walk-through and videos will help you shortlist your dream house, sitting on your couch

Data driven recommendations : Our data algorithm will amaze you with smart suggestions and bring you a step closer to your dream house

We are your buddy : Your single point of contact for all your needs & queries, during the transaction and after
name: PROPACY INTERNET PRIVATE LIMITED
